    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}|(}
\section{Class reliafree.function.Function}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function}
The Function class is used to represent a function in a system being 
analyzed.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Methods                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Methods}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:__init__}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.\_\_init\_\_ \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{\_\_init\_\_}(\textit{self}, \textit{application})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Initializes the Function Object.

    Keyword Arguments: application -- the RelKit application.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:load_attributes}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.load\_attributes \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{load\_attributes}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Loads the Function Object attribute values from the Function Object 
    TreeView.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:create_tree}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.create\_tree \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{create\_tree}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Creates the Function TreeView and connects it to callback functions to 
    handle editting.  Background and foreground colors can be set using the
    user-defined values in the RelKit configuration file.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:load_tree}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.load\_tree \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{load\_tree}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Loads the Function treeview model with system information. This 
    information can be stored either in a MySQL database.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:add_function}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.add\_function \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{add\_function}(\textit{self}, \textit{widget}, \textit{type\_})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Adds a new Function to the Program's MySQL database.

    Keyword Arguments: widget -- the widget that called this function. 
    type\_  -- the type of Function to add; 0 = sibling, 1 = child.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:delete_function}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.delete\_function \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{delete\_function}(\textit{self}, \textit{menuitem})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Deletes the currently selected Function from the Program's MySQL 
    database.

    Keyword Arguments: menuitem -- the gtk.MenuItem that called this 
    function.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:load_general_data}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.load\_general\_data \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{load\_general\_data}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Loads the widgets with general information about the Function Object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:load_functional_matrix_tab}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.load\_functional\_matrix\_tab \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{load\_functional\_matrix\_tab}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Creates the TreeView wisget to display the Hardware/Function 
    relationship matrix.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:load_calculation_results}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.load\_calculation\_results \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{load\_calculation\_results}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Loads the widgets with calculation results for the Function Object.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{reliafree:function:Function:rollup}
    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}!reliafree.function.Function.rollup \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{rollup}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Calculates the sum of various parameters for the Function Object. This 
    is the sum of corresponding component values.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.function \textit{(module)}!reliafree.function.Function \textit{(class)}|)}
